properties.description: Capturing interface name from payload if present if %Y else from %M.
properties.script:
import re
interface = '$activity.definition_activity_01UK14JOAMMDV6R02gHIeOmw2qkXGdluijM.output.variable_workflow_01T8J3FDV8G4K7hiRvLwfY8kcRCvvkMa6XR$'
event_policy_name = '$activity.definition_activity_01UK14JOAMMDV6R02gHIeOmw2qkXGdluijM.output.variable_workflow_01T8J4OUKFEXL4WhE58Q2r4KCySef5YGZba$'
event_message = '$activity.definition_activity_01UK14JOAMMDV6R02gHIeOmw2qkXGdluijM.output.variable_workflow_01T8J5AW9TZ8B3smDvtFSz2OUPWibgZcQvh$'

#check if Interface Name in %Y else check Interface Name in %M or event_message
try:
    if interface and interface != "":
        output = interface

    elif event_policy_name == "CISCO: Interface status changed - DOWN":
        regex = r"ifName[:.]?\d*:\s(?P<interface>.*?);"
        output = re.search(regex, event_message, flags=re.MULTILINE | re.IGNORECASE).group(1)
    elif event_policy_name == "CMS ACI Fault - fltEthpmIfPortDownFabric" or event_policy_name == "CMS ACI Fault - fltEthpmIfPortDownFabric - F1394":
        regex = r"phys-\[(.*)\]/phys"
        output = re.search(regex, event_message, flags=re.MULTILINE | re.IGNORECASE).group(1)
    else:
        regex = r"(?:interface[:\-,]?.*?(?:Name[:\s]*?)+(\w*?[^;,:\s]+))|(?:interface[:\-,]?\s(\w*?[^;,:\s]+))"
        result = re.findall(regex, event_message, flags=re.MULTILINE | re.IGNORECASE)
        output = [x[1] if not x[0] else x[0] for x in result][0]


    output = output.replace("Interface:", "").replace("interface:", "").replace("Name:", "").replace("name:", "")
except Exception as e:
      output = interface
